thread.title: Deal: Grab the 2017 NVIDIA SHIELD TV for $169 w/ Code – 2/7/17
thread.title_full: Deal: Grab the 2017 NVIDIA SHIELD TV for $169 w/ Code – 2/7/17

author: Alexander Maxham
title: Deal: Grab the 2017 NVIDIA SHIELD TV for $169 w/ Code – 2/7/17
text:
Deal: Grab the 2017 NVIDIA SHIELD TV for $169 w/ Code – 2/7/17   Alexander Maxham 
NVIDIA announced an update to the SHIELD TV at CES 2017 last month. Unveiling new hardware, including the remote and offering it for the same price. The streaming set-top box now supports HDR in addition to 4K resolution, making it one of the best set-top boxes around. Additionally, it’s a great set-top box for those that are gamers, especially with Steam. This is an Android TV console, so you’ll get all of your favorite Android apps included, like YouTube, Hulu, Netflix, Google Play Movies & TV, Plex, Kodi and many more. You also have the ability to Cast movies and other video to the big screen with the NVIDIA SHIELD TV . 
The NVIDIA SHIELD TV is priced at $199 for 16GB of storage, which is already a great price, even if it is the normal price, but right now it’s available for even less. If you are a new customer at Jet.com, you can save an extra 15% on the NVIDIA SHIELD TV, making it just $169. You’ll need to use the promo code TRIPLE15 at checkout. Not only will you get 15% off of this order, but also your next two orders, which is a great way to get users into using Jet.com. You can grab the NVIDIA SHIELD TV from the link below.
